ingredients.ingredient: 12 ounces ground chorizo or Italian sausage
½ cup chopped green bell pepper
1 (20 ounce) package Simply Potatoes® Southwest Style Hash Browns
2 cups shredded Monterey Jack or Cheddar cheese

cookingTips: Brown the sausage thoroughly to render fat and develop flavor
Let casserole rest 10 minutes after baking before serving for cleaner cuts
Combine eggs and milk well to ensure even custard distribution
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Are you familiar with making savory breakfast casseroles? Would you like guidance on preventing a dry, overcooked texture?
